Package game

Class OthelloGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.OthelloGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game
    public class OthelloGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    Represents the Othello (Reversi) Game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ALPHABET  
      static int NUMBER_PLAYERS  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OthelloGame​(Player p1, Player p2)
      Constructs a game of Othello with initial setup: current player is black and the initial board.
      OthelloGame​(Player p1, Player p2, BoardConfiguration configuration)
      Constructs a game of Othello with a configuration supplied to the configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      char convertMove​(int input)
      Converts the move from the integer representation to the letter index.
      int convertMove​(java.lang.String input)
      Converts the move from the letter representation to the integer index.
      Board getBoard()
      Returns the board of the game.
      Player getCurrent()
      Returns the current player of the game.
      java.lang.String getMarkChar​(Mark m)
      Returns a representation of the black mark as a black circle and white mark as a white circle.
      Player[] getPlayers()
      Returns an array with the players of the game.
      void makeMove​(int index)
      Makes a move on the board of this game for the current player.
      void pass()
      Changes the current player's turn to the other one.
      java.lang.String update()
      Returns the current representation of the game board, including: the positions of the marks, the possible moves of the current player encoded as uppercase letters and the scores of both players.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OthelloGame

        public OthelloGame​(Player p1,
                   Player p2)
        Constructs a game of Othello with initial setup: current player is black and the initial board.
        Parameters:
        p1 - the first player of the game.
        p2 - the second player of the game.

      • OthelloGame

        public OthelloGame​(Player p1,
                   Player p2,
                   BoardConfiguration configuration)
        Constructs a game of Othello with a configuration supplied to the configuration. This can be with any starting config.
        Parameters:
        p1 - the first player of the game.
        p2 - the second player of the game.
        configuration - the board configuration

        public void makeMove​(int index)
              throws IllegalMoveException,
                     InvalidFieldException
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Makes a move on the board of this game for the current player.
        Specified by:
        makeMove in interface Game
        Parameters:
        index - the index on the board where to put the mark.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - when the move is not possible.
        InvalidFieldException - when the index is not a valid field on the board.
